last_episode_to_air.name: Don't Stop Now
last_episode_to_air.overview: Successes for some balance setbacks for others. Meanwhile, viral outbreaks continue to claim lives across the globe — and a larger pandemic looms.

name: Pandemic: How to Prevent an Outbreak
original_name: Pandemic: How to Prevent an Outbreak
overview: In this docuseries, meet the heroes on the front lines of the battle against influenza and learn about their efforts to stop the next global outbreak.

episodes.name: It Hunts Us
episodes.overview: In this introduction to life on the front lines, doctors in the U.S. and Asia battle the flu, and researchers race to develop a universal vaccine.

episodes.name: Pandemic Is Now
episodes.overview: Vaccine debates rage while health-care workers inoculate against the Ebola virus in Congo and influenza in detainee camps at the U.S.-Mexico border.

episodes.name: Seek, Don't Hide
episodes.overview: Worldwide, scientists test animals and their handlers for emerging viruses. In the U.S. and India, doctors work long hours caring for flu patients.

episodes.name: Hold On to Your Roots
episodes.overview: Anti-vaccine debate escalates, and medical staff are attacked in Congo. Funding cuts hit hard in the U.S., but researchers in Guatemala make strides.

episodes.name: Prayers Might Work
episodes.overview: Around the world, community, family and faith help physicians and medical advocates stay strong in the face of long hours and a relentless disease.

episodes.name: Don't Stop Now
episodes.overview: Successes for some balance setbacks for others. Meanwhile, viral outbreaks continue to claim lives across the globe — and a larger pandemic looms.
